Create an 'isbot' feature from 'botscore'
```{r}
dataset$botscore <- as.numeric(dataset$botscore)
classifybot <- which(dataset$botscore > 0.5)

dataset$isbot <- 0
dataset$isbot[classifybot] <- 1

View(dataset[, c('isbot', 'botscore')])
```
